verses.verse: A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is my <S%H7462>shepherd;<s%> I shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2637>want.<s%>
He maketh me to lie <S%H7257>down<s%> in <S%H1877>green<s%> <S%H4999>pastures:<s%> he <S%H5095>leadeth<s%> me <S%H5921>beside<s%> the <S%H4496>still<s%> <S%H4325>waters.<s%>
He <S%H7725>restoreth<s%> my <S%H5315>soul:<s%> he <S%H5148>leadeth<s%> me in the <S%H4570>paths<s%> of <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> for his name's <S%H4616>sake.<s%> <S%H8034><s%>

Yea, <S%H1571><s%> <S%H3588>though<s%> I <S%H1980>walk<s%> through the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of the shadow of <S%H6757>death,<s%> I will <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H7451>evil:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> art <S%H5978>with<s%> me; thy <S%H7626>rod<s%> and thy <S%H4938>staff<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> <S%H5162>comfort<s%> me.

Thou <S%H6186>preparest<s%> a <S%H7979>table<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me in the <S%H5048>presence<s%> of mine <S%H6887>enemies:<s%> thou <S%H1878>anointest<s%> my <S%H7218>head<s%> with <S%H8081>oil;<s%> my <S%H3563>cup<s%> runneth <S%H7310>over.<s%>

Surely <S%H389><s%> <S%H2896>goodness<s%> and <S%H2617>mercy<s%> shall <S%H7291>follow<s%> me <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of my <S%H2416>life:<s%> and I will <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H753>forever.<s%> <S%H3117><s%>
